/*
1-desig
2-tous
*/
-------------------------------------------------1-desig------------------------------------------------
	
	SELECT 
	'1' as 'EntityID'
		,CAST('1' AS varchar) + CAST(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, a.AGENT))AS varchar) AS 'AgentKey'
		,a.AGENTCODE AS 'מספר סוכן'
		,CASE 
			WHEN a.AGENT <> 0
				THEN a.AGENTNAME
			ELSE 'Missing Agent\ללא סוכן'
			END AS 'סוכן'
		,CASE 
			WHEN ma.AGENT = 0
				THEN NULL
			ELSE ma.AGENT
			END AS 'ManagerAgentKey'
		,CASE 
			WHEN ma.AGENT = 0
				THEN 'Missing Manager\ללא מנהל'
			ELSE ma.AGENTNAME
			END AS 'מנהל'
		,NULL AS 'PBIUser' ----2.1
	
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime
	FROM [desig].[dbo].AGENTS a
	LEFT JOIN [desig].[dbo].AGENTS ma ON a.MAGENT = ma.AGENT ----1.1
		
	WHERE 1 = 1

-------------------------------------------------2-tous------------------------------------------------
union all

	SELECT 
	'2' as 'EntityID'
		,CAST('2' AS varchar) + CAST(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, a.AGENT))AS varchar) AS 'AgentKey'
		,a.AGENTCODE AS 'מספר סוכן'
		,CASE 
			WHEN a.AGENT <> 0
				THEN a.AGENTNAME
			ELSE 'Missing Agent\ללא סוכן'
			END AS 'סוכן'
		,CASE 
			WHEN ma.AGENT = 0
				THEN NULL
			ELSE ma.AGENT
			END AS 'ManagerAgentKey'
		,CASE 
			WHEN ma.AGENT = 0
				THEN 'Missing Manager\ללא מנהל'
			ELSE ma.AGENTNAME
			END AS 'מנהל'
		,NULL AS 'PBIUser' ----2.1
	
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime
	FROM [tous].[dbo].AGENTS a
	LEFT JOIN [tous].[dbo].AGENTS ma ON a.MAGENT = ma.AGENT ----1.1

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

-------------------------------------------------1-desig------------------------------------------------

SELECT distinct
'1' as 'EntityID'
,CAST('1' as varchar) + cast(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, b.BRANCH))as varchar) AS  'BranchKey'
,b.BRANCHNAME 'מספר סניף'
	,CASE WHEN b.BRANCH = 0
				THEN 'ללא סניף'
			ELSE system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(BRANCHDES)
			END AS 'סניף'
,BRANCHNAME   + ' | ' +  system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(b.BRANCHDES) AS 'מזהה סניף'
--,pn.SUBNETWORKCODE as 'קוד תת רשת'
	,b.STATE 'ישוב'


		,NULL AS 'מטר רבוע'
   ,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(d.DISTRICTDES) as 'איזור'
		,pn.SUBNETWORKDES as 'תת רשת'
		
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetim



FROM [desig].[dbo].BRANCHES b
left join [desig].[dbo].DISTRICTS d on d.DISTRICT=b.DISTRICT
left join [desig].[dbo].POS_SUBNETWORKS pn on pn.SUBNETWORK=b.POS_SUBNETWORK
left join [desig].[dbo].WAREHOUSES w on w.WARHS=b.WARHS

WHERE 1=1
and b.BRANCHDES <>''


-------------------------------------------------2-tous------------------------------------------------
union all


SELECT distinct
'2' as 'EntityID'
,CAST('2' as varchar) + cast(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, b.BRANCH))as varchar) AS  'BranchKey'
,b.BRANCHNAME 'מספר סניף'
	,CASE WHEN b.BRANCH = 0
				THEN 'ללא סניף'
			ELSE system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(BRANCHDES)
			END AS 'סניף'
,BRANCHNAME   + ' | ' +  system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(b.BRANCHDES) AS 'מזהה סניף'
--,pn.SUBNETWORKCODE as 'קוד תת רשת'
	,b.STATE 'ישוב'


		,NULL AS 'מטר רבוע'
   ,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(d.DISTRICTDES) as 'איזור'
		,pn.SUBNETWORKDES as 'תת רשת'
		
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetim



FROM [tous].[dbo].BRANCHES b
left join [tous].[dbo].DISTRICTS d on d.DISTRICT=b.DISTRICT
left join [tous].[dbo].POS_SUBNETWORKS pn on pn.SUBNETWORK=b.POS_SUBNETWORK
left join [tous].[dbo].WAREHOUSES w on w.WARHS=b.WARHS

WHERE 1=1
and b.BRANCHDES <>''

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

select 
'1' as 'EntityID'
,CAST('1' as varchar) + cast(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, c.CUST))as varchar) AS 'AccountKey'
,c.CUSTNAME as 'מספר לקוח'
,c.CUSTNAME + ' | ' +case when substring(c.CUSTDES,1,1) like '%[a-z,A-Z]%' or substring(c.CUSTDES,1,1)='.'  
THEN  system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(c.CUSTDES)

THEN  system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(c.CUSTDES) 
ELSE system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(c.CUSTDES) end as 'שם לקוח'

----Enable This Part for Parent and Child Customers method

--,c2.CUSTNAME as 'מספר לקוח אב'
--,c2.CUSTNAME + ' | ' +case when substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1) like '%[a-z,A-Z]%' or substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1)='.'  THEN  REVERSE(c2.CUSTDES) ELSE c2.CUSTDES end as 'מזהה לקוח אב'
--,case when substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1) like '%[a-z,A-Z]%' or substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1)='.'  THEN  REVERSE(c2.CUSTDES) ELSE c2.CUSTDES end as 'שם לקוח אב'
--,Case when c2.CUSTDES='' then c.CUSTDES else case when substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1) like '%[a-z,A-Z]%' or substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1)='.'  THEN  REVERSE(c2.CUSTDES) ELSE c2.CUSTDES end end as 'לקוחות' -- this fiels enable to contain all regular customers and all Fathers in the sam column

,ct.CTYPECODE as 'קוד קטגורייה'
,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(ct.CTYPENAME) as 'קטגוריית לקוח' 
,cs.SPEC1 AS 'פרמטר 1'
,cs.SPEC2 AS 'פרמטר 2'
,cs.SPEC3 AS 'פרמטר 3'
,cs.SPEC4 AS 'פרמטר 4'
,cs.SPEC5 AS 'פרמטר 5'
,cs.SPEC6 AS 'פרמטר 6'
,cs.SPEC7 AS 'פרמטר 7'
,cs.SPEC8 AS 'פרמטר 8'
,c.[STATE] AS 'עיר'
,c.ADDRESS AS 'כתובת'
,c.PHONE AS 'מספר טלפון'
,cst.STATDES AS 'סטטוס לקוח'
,CAST('1' as varchar) + cast(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, c.AGENT))as varchar) AS 'AgentKey'
,null as 'תנאי תשלום ללקוח'
,null AS 'MAXOBLIGO'
,null as 'MAXCREDIT'
,null as 'אובליגו'
,null as 'OBLIGO Balance' --יתרת אובליגו		
,null 'IsClubMember' --need to change according to your cust
,null as 'מגדר' --need to change according to your cust
,null as 'גיל' --need to change according to your cust
,null as 'תאריך יום הולדת' --need to change according to your cust
,null as 'תאריך הצטרפות'
,null as 'תאריך תוקף מועדון' --need to change according to your cust
,null as 'שיוך למועדון לקוחות' --need to change according to your cust
,null as 'אישור מייל' --need to change according to your cust
,null as 'אישור SMS' --need to change according to your cust
,case when Month(getdate())= MoNTH(DATEADD(year, -18, CONVERT(SMALLDATETIME, (c.CREATEDDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0))) 
 then 'חודש נוכחי' else FORMAT(DATEADD(year, -18, CONVERT(SMALLDATETIME, (c.CREATEDDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0)),'MMMM')
 END as 'חודש יום הולדת' --need to change according to your cust
,c.BRANCH as 'JoinBranchID' --need to change according to your cust

,GETDATE() AS 'RowInsertDatetime'


from [desig].[dbo].CUSTOMERS c
Left join [desig].[dbo].CTYPE ct  on c.CTYPE=ct.CTYPE
Left join [desig].[dbo].CUSTSPEC cs on cs.CUST=c.CUST
Left join [desig].[dbo].[COUNTRIES] on [COUNTRIES].COUNTRY=c.COUNTRY
left join [desig].[dbo].CUSTOMERS c2 on c.MCUST=c2.CUST ----Enable This Part for Parent and Child Customers method
left join [desig].[dbo].CUSTSTATS cst on c.CUSTSTAT=cst.CUSTSTAT

where
exists
(
SELECT null FROM [desig].[dbo].INVOICES i
where i.CUST=c.CUST
)
or  exists
(
SELECT null  FROM [desig].[dbo].DOCUMENTS d
where d.CUST=c.CUST
)

-------------------------------------------------1-desig------------------------------------------------
SELECT 

'1' as 'EntityID'
          ,pt.TRANSACTNUM AS 'חשבונית'
		--,ii.KLINE AS 'InvoiceLineNumber'
		,'POS' AS 'DocName'
		,CAST('1' as varchar) + CAST(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, pt.CUST)) as varchar)   AS 'AccountKey' 

		--choose one of the above , The defauls is uncomment :
		,CONVERT(SMALLDATETIME, (pt.CURDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0) AS 'Date' -- Invoice date  -- Date from Invoices in case you need just invoices 

		,pt.CURTIME/60 AS 'Time'

		,CAST('1' as varchar) + CAST(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, pti.POS_USERBSALE)) as varchar) AS 'AgentKey' -- the sales representor

		,CAST('1' as varchar) + CAST(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, pti.PART)) as varchar) AS 'ItemKey'



		,CAST('1' as varchar) + CAST(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, pt.BRANCH)) as varchar) AS 'BranchKey'
	--	,null as 'EmployeeKey'
		--,pti.CLUB as 'חבר מועדון'

		--,(1 - (1 - ii.[T$PERCENT] / 100) * (1 - i.[T$PERCENT] / 100)) AS 'DiscountPercent' -- the DiscountPercent for the invoice and invoice line

		,ROUND((1-(1-(pti.T$PERCENT/100))*(1-(pti.GENDISCPERC/100)))*(pti.PRICE*(pti.QUANT/1000))/(1+(pti.VATPERCENT/100)),2) AS 'LineTotalDiscount' -- the discount from gross price to the net
		,ROUND((1-(1-(pti.T$PERCENT/100))*(1-(pti.GENDISCPERC/100)))*(pti.PRICE*(pti.QUANT/1000)),2) as 'LineTotalDiscountVAT'
		--,ROUND(ii.PRICE, 2) * ii.IEXCHANGE AS 'UnitGrossPrice'
		,ROUND(pti.PRICE/(1+(pti.VATPERCENT/100)),2) AS 'UnitNetPrice'
		,pti.PRICE as 'UnitPriceVAT'

		,(pti.QUANT/1000.0) AS 'Quantity'
	--	,null as 'factoryQuantity'
	--	,null AS 'LineTotalCost' 
		,(1-(pti.T$PERCENT/100))*(1-(pti.GENDISCPERC/100))*(pti.PRICE/(1+(pti.VATPERCENT/100))*(pti.QUANT/1000.0)) AS 'LineTotalNet'
		--ROUND((pti.IPRICEADISCOUNTBVAT*(pti.QUANT/1000)),2) AS 'LineTotalNet'

	--    ,null AS 'LineTotalNet_USD'
		,ROUND((pti.IPRICEADISCOUNTBVAT*(pti.QUANT/1000.0)*(1+(pti.VATPERCENT/100))),2) AS 'LineTotalNetVAT'
	--	,null AS 'LineTotalNetVAT_USD'
		,CONVERT(INT, LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, (i.IVDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0), 112), 6)) AS YearMonth
		--,null as 'סטטוס'
		--,null  as 'ChargeFlag'  
		--,null as 'סטטוס ליקוט כותרת'
	 --   ,null  as 'סטטוס ליקוט שורה'
		--,null  as 'דגל סטורנו'
	--	,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime


from [desig].[dbo].POS_TRANSACTIONS pt 
left join  [desig].[dbo].POS_TRANSACTITEMS pti on pti.TRANSACT=pt.TRANSACT
left join [desig].[dbo].PART p on p.PART=pti.PART
--left join [desig].[dbo].Costs cost on cost.CURDATE=pt.CURDATE and cost.ItemID=pti.PART
left join [desig].[dbo].INVOICES i on i.IV=pti.IV
			
WHERE 1=1 
AND (pt.CURDATE <> 51852960 and CONVERT(SMALLDATETIME, (pt.CURDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0) = cast (GETDATE() as date))
--and pti.PART <> ''
-------------------------------------------------2-tous------------------------------------------------

		--,(1 - (1 - ii.[T$PERCENT] / 100) * (1 - i.[T$PERCENT] / 100)) AS 'DiscountPercent' -- the DiscountPercent for the invoice and invoice line

		,ROUND((1-(1-(pti.T$PERCENT/100))*(1-(pti.GENDISCPERC/100)))*(pti.PRICE*(pti.QUANT/1000))/(1+(pti.VATPERCENT/100)),2) AS 'LineTotalDiscount' -- the discount from gross price to the net
		,ROUND((1-(1-(pti.T$PERCENT/100))*(1-(pti.GENDISCPERC/100)))*(pti.PRICE*(pti.QUANT/1000)),2) as 'LineTotalDiscountVAT'
		--,ROUND(ii.PRICE, 2) * ii.IEXCHANGE AS 'UnitGrossPrice'

		--,null AS 'LineTotalCost'

		--ROUND((pti.IPRICEADISCOUNTBVAT*(pti.QUANT/1000)),2) AS 'LineTotalNet'

	  --  ,null AS 'LineTotalNet_USD'
		,ROUND((pti.IPRICEADISCOUNTBVAT*(pti.QUANT/1000.0)*(1+(pti.VATPERCENT/100))),2) AS 'LineTotalNetVAT'

		--,null as 'סטטוס'
		--,null  as 'ChargeFlag'  
		--,null as 'סטטוס ליקוט כותרת'
	   -- ,null  as 'סטטוס ליקוט שורה'
		--,null  as 'דגל סטורנו'
		--,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime



from [tous].[dbo].POS_TRANSACTIONS pt 
left join  [tous].[dbo].POS_TRANSACTITEMS pti on pti.TRANSACT=pt.TRANSACT
left join [tous].[dbo].PART p on p.PART=pti.PART
--left join [tous].[dbo].Costs cost on cost.CURDATE=pt.CURDATE and cost.ItemID=pti.PART
left join [tous].[dbo].INVOICES i on i.IV=pti.IV
			
WHERE 1=1 
AND CONVERT(SMALLDATETIME, (pt.CURDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0) = cast (GETDATE() as date)
--and pti.PART <> ''

SELECT
	   DISTINCT([AUDITID])
      ,AU.[USERID] AS 'משתמש'
      ,AU.[ACTIVITYDATE] AS 'זמן הפעולה'
	  ,cast(AU.[ACTIVITYDATE] as date) AS 'Date'
      ,AU.[DOCUMENT] AS 'שם מסמך'
      ,AU.[DOCUMENTLINE] AS 'שורת מסמך'
      ,AU.[FROMLOAD] AS 'מטעינה'
      ,AU.[TOLOAD] AS 'לטעינה'
      ,AU.[FROMLOC] AS 'ממיקום'
      ,AU.[TOLOC] AS 'למיקום'
      ,AU.[FROMQTY] AS 'מכמות'
      ,AU.[TOCONTAINER] AS 'לקונטיינר'
	  ,VS.[SKU] AS 'מספר פריט'
	  ,VS.[SKUDESC] AS 'תאור פריט'
	  ,OL.ORDERID AS 'מספר הזמנה'
      ,AU.[TOQTY] AS 'לכמות'
	  ,VS.each_in_case -- CHECK IF NULL FOR 1 
	  ,ISNULL(VS.each_in_case,1.00)		AS 'גורם אירוז'
	  ,FLOOR(AU.TOQTY / ISNULL(VS.each_in_case,1.00) ) AS 'כמות ארגזים'
	  ,AU.TOQTY - (ISNULL(VS.each_in_case,1.00) * FLOOR(AU.TOQTY/ ISNULL(VS.each_in_case,1.00) )) AS 'כמות יחידות'

FROM [SCEXPERT].[dbo].[vsku] VS
LEFT JOIN [SCEXPERT].[dbo].[AUDIT] AU	ON VS.SKU = AU.SKU 
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[ORDERLOADS] OL			ON OL.PICKLIST = AU.DOCUMENT
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[SKUUOM] SKUU			ON SKUU.SKU = VS.SKU

WHERE AU.CONSIGNEE = 'JV'
AND AU.ACTIVITYTYPE = 'PICKLOAD'

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

--,CONCAT('1', Inv.ItemKey) as 'ItemKey'
,cast('1' as varchar) + cast(Inv.ItemKey as varchar) as 'ItemKey'
,cast(Inv.[Date] as date) as 'Date'
,Inv.[TYPE] as 'Type'
,Inv.[Status] as 'סטטוס'
--,'1' + Inv.[WarehsKey] as 'WarehsKey'
--,CONCAT('1' , Inv.[WarehsKey]) as 'WarehsKey'
,CAST('1' as varchar) + cast( Inv.[WarehsKey] as varchar) as 'WarehsKey'
--,'1' + Inv.[BranchKey] as 'BranchKey'
--,Concat('1', Inv.[BranchKey]) as 'BranchKey'
,CAST('1' as varchar) + cast(Inv.[BranchKey] as varchar) as 'BranchKey'
,Inv.[CostperUnit]
,SUM(Quantity) as 'Quantity'
,SUM([Stock Value]) as 'StockValue'


,Inv.[RowInsertDatetime]
FROM
(
		 SELECT 
		CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, wb.PART)) AS 'ItemKey'
		,convert(smalldatetime, (wb.LASTDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0) AS 'Date'
		,ws.[TYPE] 	
		,c.CUSTNAME AS 'Status'
		,CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, wb.WARHS)) AS 'WarehsKey'
		,CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, ws.POS_BRANCH)) AS 'BranchKey' -- Only Retail with POS
		--,CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, b.BRANCH)) AS 'BranchKey' -- Only Retail without POS
		,p.COST as 'CostperUnit'
		,(wb.BALANCE) / 1000.0 AS 'Quantity' 
		,(wb.BALANCE) / 1000.0 * (p.COST) as 'Stock Value'
		
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime
		--,wt.WARHSTYPENAME -- Only QA 
		-- ,p.PARTNAME -- Only QA  
		--,ws.WARHSNAME -- Only QA
		--,w.WARHSDES  -- Only QA
       FROM [desig].[dbo].WARHSBAL wb 
       Left join  [desig].[dbo].WAREHOUSES ws ON ws.WARHS = wb.WARHS 
       Left join  [desig].[dbo].CUSTOMERS c ON c.CUST = wb.CUST   
       Left join  [desig].[dbo].PART p on wb.PART=p.PART 
	   Left join  [desig].[dbo].BRANCHES b ON b.WARHS = wb.WARHS -- Only Retail without POS
	  -- left join [dbo].WARHSTYPE wt on wt.WARHSTYPE=w.WARHSTYPE -- Only QA
WHERE  1 = 1
and year(convert(smalldatetime, (wb.LASTDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0)) >= 2018
       --and ws.WARHSNAME in ('Main', 'SV')  --QA Filter
	   --and p.PARTNAME='LL-1C' --QA Filter
	   --and convert(smalldatetime, (wb.LASTDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0)>='01/01/2016' --QA Filter
)Inv
GROUP BY
Inv.ItemKey
,Inv.Date
,Inv.TYPE
,Inv.Status
,Inv.WarehsKey
,Inv.BranchKey
,Inv.CostperUnit
,Inv.RowInsertDatetime

-------------------------------------------------2-tous------------------------------------------------
union all

select 
'2' as 'EntityID'
--,'1' + Inv.ItemKey as 'ItemKey'
--,CONCAT('1', Inv.ItemKey) as 'ItemKey'
,cast('2' as varchar) + cast(Inv.ItemKey as varchar) as 'ItemKey'
,cast(Inv.[Date] as date) as 'Date'
,Inv.[TYPE] as 'Type'
,Inv.[Status] as 'סטטוס'
,CAST('2' as varchar) + cast( Inv.[WarehsKey] as varchar) as 'WarehsKey'
,CAST('2' as varchar) + cast(Inv.[BranchKey] as varchar) as 'BranchKey'
,Inv.[CostperUnit]
,SUM(Quantity) as 'Quantity'
,SUM([Stock Value]) as 'StockValue'


,Inv.[RowInsertDatetime]
FROM
(
		 SELECT 
		CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, wb.PART)) AS 'ItemKey'
		,convert(smalldatetime, (wb.LASTDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0) AS 'Date'
		,ws.[TYPE] 	
		,c.CUSTNAME AS 'Status'
		,CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, wb.WARHS)) AS 'WarehsKey'
		,CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, ws.POS_BRANCH)) AS 'BranchKey' -- Only Retail with POS
		--,CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, b.BRANCH)) AS 'BranchKey' -- Only Retail without POS
		,p.COST as 'CostperUnit'
		,(wb.BALANCE) / 1000.0 AS 'Quantity' 
		,(wb.BALANCE) / 1000.0 * (p.COST) as 'Stock Value'
		
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime
		--,wt.WARHSTYPENAME -- Only QA 
		-- ,p.PARTNAME -- Only QA  
		--,ws.WARHSNAME -- Only QA
		--,w.WARHSDES  -- Only QA
       FROM [tous].[dbo].WARHSBAL wb 
       Left join  [tous].[dbo].WAREHOUSES ws ON ws.WARHS = wb.WARHS 
       Left join  [tous].[dbo].CUSTOMERS c ON c.CUST = wb.CUST   
       Left join  [tous].[dbo].PART p on wb.PART=p.PART 
	   Left join  [tous].[dbo].BRANCHES b ON b.WARHS = wb.WARHS -- Only Retail without POS
	  -- left join [dbo].WARHSTYPE wt on wt.WARHSTYPE=w.WARHSTYPE -- Only QA
WHERE  1 = 1
and year(convert(smalldatetime, (wb.LASTDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0)) >= 2018
       --and ws.WARHSNAME in ('Main', 'SV')  --QA Filter
	   --and p.PARTNAME='LL-1C' --QA Filter
	   --and convert(smalldatetime, (wb.LASTDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0)>='01/01/2016' --QA Filter
)Inv
GROUP BY
Inv.ItemKey
,Inv.Date
,Inv.TYPE
,Inv.Status
,Inv.WarehsKey
,Inv.BranchKey
,Inv.CostperUnit
,Inv.RowInsertDatetime

		,null AS 'מיון מלאי'
		,null AS 'תאריך כניסה אחרון למלאי'
		,NULL AS 'סוג ייבוא' -- if coming from local or imported 
		,NULL AS 'יחידות מכירה' -- from UNIT Table 
		,NULL AS 'גודל'
		,NULL AS 'משקל'
		,null as 'מנוהל מלאי'
		
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime


from [desig].[dbo].PART p 
	left join [desig].[dbo].FAMILY f on p.FAMILY=f.FAMILY
	left join [desig].[dbo].FAMILYTYPES ft on f.FAMILYTYPE=ft.FAMILYTYPE
	left join [desig].[dbo].PARTSPEC ps on p.PART=ps.PART
	left join [desig].[dbo].PART p2 on p.MPART=p2.PART
	inner join (
	select
	pti.PART
	,max(convert(smalldatetime, (pt.CURDATE + pt.CURTIME + 46283040) / 1440.0)) as 'DateTime'
	from [desig].[dbo].POS_TRANSACTIONS pt
	left join [desig].[dbo].POS_TRANSACTITEMS pti on pti.TRANSACT=pt.TRANSACT
	where 1=1
	and (pt.CURDATE <> 51852960 and convert(smalldatetime, (pt.CURDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0) >= DATEADD(Year,-3,DATEADD(yy, DATEDIFF(yy, 0, GETDATE()), 0)))
	and pti.IPRICEADISCOUNTBVAT<>0
	group by pti.PART
	) pti on pti.PART=p.PART

	where 1=1

/*

-------------------------------------------------1-desig------------------------------------------------
	
	SELECT 
	'1' as 'EntityID'
		,CAST('1' AS varchar) + CAST(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, a.AGENT))AS varchar) AS 'AgentKey'
		,a.AGENTCODE AS 'מספר סוכן'
		,CASE 
			WHEN a.AGENT <> 0
				THEN a.AGENTNAME
			ELSE 'Missing Agent\ללא סוכן'
			END AS 'סוכן'
		,CASE 
			WHEN ma.AGENT = 0
				THEN NULL
			ELSE ma.AGENT
			END AS 'ManagerAgentKey'
		,CASE 
			WHEN ma.AGENT = 0
				THEN 'Missing Manager\ללא מנהל'
			ELSE ma.AGENTNAME
			END AS 'מנהל'
		,NULL AS 'PBIUser' ----2.1
	
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime
	FROM [desig].[dbo].AGENTS a
	LEFT JOIN [desig].[dbo].AGENTS ma ON a.MAGENT = ma.AGENT ----1.1
		
	WHERE 1 = 1

-------------------------------------------------2-tous------------------------------------------------
union all

	SELECT 
	'2' as 'EntityID'
		,CAST('2' AS varchar) + CAST(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, a.AGENT))AS varchar) AS 'AgentKey'
		,a.AGENTCODE AS 'מספר סוכן'
		,CASE 
			WHEN a.AGENT <> 0
				THEN a.AGENTNAME
			ELSE 'Missing Agent\ללא סוכן'
			END AS 'סוכן'
		,CASE 
			WHEN ma.AGENT = 0
				THEN NULL
			ELSE ma.AGENT
			END AS 'ManagerAgentKey'
		,CASE 
			WHEN ma.AGENT = 0
				THEN 'Missing Manager\ללא מנהל'
			ELSE ma.AGENTNAME
			END AS 'מנהל'
		,NULL AS 'PBIUser' ----2.1
	
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime
	FROM [tous].[dbo].AGENTS a
	LEFT JOIN [tous].[dbo].AGENTS ma ON a.MAGENT = ma.AGENT ----1.1

SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

select 
'1' as 'EntityID'
,CAST('1' as varchar) + cast(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, c.CUST))as varchar) AS 'AccountKey'
,c.CUSTNAME as 'מספר לקוח'
,c.CUSTNAME + ' | ' +case when substring(c.CUSTDES,1,1) like '%[a-z,A-Z]%' or substring(c.CUSTDES,1,1)='.'  
THEN  system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(c.CUSTDES) 
ELSE system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(c.CUSTDES) end as 'מזהה לקוח'
,case when substring(c.CUSTDES,1,1) like '%[a-z,A-Z]%' or substring(c.CUSTDES,1,1)='.'  
THEN  system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(c.CUSTDES) 
ELSE system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(c.CUSTDES) end as 'שם לקוח'

----Enable This Part for Parent and Child Customers method

--,c2.CUSTNAME as 'מספר לקוח אב'
--,c2.CUSTNAME + ' | ' +case when substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1) like '%[a-z,A-Z]%' or substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1)='.'  THEN  REVERSE(c2.CUSTDES) ELSE c2.CUSTDES end as 'מזהה לקוח אב'
--,case when substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1) like '%[a-z,A-Z]%' or substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1)='.'  THEN  REVERSE(c2.CUSTDES) ELSE c2.CUSTDES end as 'שם לקוח אב'
--,Case when c2.CUSTDES='' then c.CUSTDES else case when substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1) like '%[a-z,A-Z]%' or substring(c2.CUSTDES,1,1)='.'  THEN  REVERSE(c2.CUSTDES) ELSE c2.CUSTDES end end as 'לקוחות' -- this fiels enable to contain all regular customers and all Fathers in the sam column

,ct.CTYPECODE as 'קוד קטגורייה'
,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(ct.CTYPENAME) as 'קטגוריית לקוח' 
,cs.SPEC1 AS 'פרמטר 1'
,cs.SPEC2 AS 'פרמטר 2'
,cs.SPEC3 AS 'פרמטר 3'
,cs.SPEC4 AS 'פרמטר 4'
,cs.SPEC5 AS 'פרמטר 5'
,cs.SPEC6 AS 'פרמטר 6'
,cs.SPEC7 AS 'פרמטר 7'
,cs.SPEC8 AS 'פרמטר 8'

select 
'1' as 'EntityID'
--,'1' + Inv.ItemKey as 'ItemKey'
--,CONCAT('1', Inv.ItemKey) as 'ItemKey'
,cast('1' as varchar) + cast(Inv.ItemKey as varchar) as 'ItemKey'
,cast(Inv.[Date] as date) as 'Date'
,Inv.[TYPE] as 'Type'
,Inv.[Status] as 'סטטוס'
--,'1' + Inv.[WarehsKey] as 'WarehsKey'
--,CONCAT('1' , Inv.[WarehsKey]) as 'WarehsKey'
,CAST('1' as varchar) + cast( Inv.[WarehsKey] as varchar) as 'WarehsKey'
--,'1' + Inv.[BranchKey] as 'BranchKey'
--,Concat('1', Inv.[BranchKey]) as 'BranchKey'
,CAST('1' as varchar) + cast(Inv.[BranchKey] as varchar) as 'BranchKey'
,Inv.[CostperUnit]
,SUM(Quantity) as 'Quantity'
,SUM([Stock Value]) as 'StockValue'


,Inv.[RowInsertDatetime]
FROM
(
		 SELECT 
		CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, wb.PART)) AS 'ItemKey'
		,convert(smalldatetime, (wb.LASTDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0) AS 'Date'
		,ws.[TYPE] 	
		,c.CUSTNAME AS 'Status'
		,CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, wb.WARHS)) AS 'WarehsKey'
		,CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, ws.POS_BRANCH)) AS 'BranchKey' -- Only Retail with POS
		--,CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, b.BRANCH)) AS 'BranchKey' -- Only Retail without POS
		,p.COST as 'CostperUnit'
		,(wb.BALANCE) / 1000.0 AS 'Quantity' 
		,(wb.BALANCE) / 1000.0 * (p.COST) as 'Stock Value'
		
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime
		--,wt.WARHSTYPENAME -- Only QA 
		-- ,p.PARTNAME -- Only QA  
		--,ws.WARHSNAME -- Only QA
		--,w.WARHSDES  -- Only QA
       FROM [desig].[dbo].WARHSBAL wb 
       Left join  [desig].[dbo].WAREHOUSES ws ON ws.WARHS = wb.WARHS 
       Left join  [desig].[dbo].CUSTOMERS c ON c.CUST = wb.CUST   
       Left join  [desig].[dbo].PART p on wb.PART=p.PART 
	   Left join  [desig].[dbo].BRANCHES b ON b.WARHS = wb.WARHS -- Only Retail without POS
	  -- left join [dbo].WARHSTYPE wt on wt.WARHSTYPE=w.WARHSTYPE -- Only QA
WHERE  1 = 1
and year(convert(smalldatetime, (wb.LASTDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0)) >= 2018
       --and ws.WARHSNAME in ('Main', 'SV')  --QA Filter
	   --and p.PARTNAME='LL-1C' --QA Filter
	   --and convert(smalldatetime, (wb.LASTDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0)>='01/01/2016' --QA Filter
)Inv
GROUP BY
Inv.ItemKey
,Inv.Date
,Inv.TYPE
,Inv.Status
,Inv.WarehsKey
,Inv.BranchKey
,Inv.CostperUnit
,Inv.RowInsertDatetime

,CAST('2' as varchar) + cast(Inv.[BranchKey] as varchar) as 'BranchKey'
,Inv.[CostperUnit]

		--,CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, b.BRANCH)) AS 'BranchKey' -- Only Retail without POS

	   --and convert(smalldatetime, (wb.LASTDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0)>='01/01/2016' --QA Filter

select DISTINCT 
	'1' as 'EntityID'

		,p.PARTNAME AS 'מקט'
		--,p.PARTDES AS 'שם מוצר'
		,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(p.PARTDES) AS 'שם מוצר'
		--,p.PARTNAME + ' | ' + p.PARTDES AS 'מזהה מוצר'

		,p2.PARTNAME AS 'מקט מרכז'
		,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(p2.PARTDES) AS 'שם מוצר מרכז'
		,p2.PARTNAME + ' | ' + system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(p2.PARTDES) AS 'מזהה מוצר מרכז'

		,f.FAMILYNAME AS 'קוד קטגוריה' -- Product Category Code

		,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(ft.FTNAME) AS 'משפחה'
		----2.2
		--,ps.STATDES AS 'סטטוס'

		,ps.SPECDES1 AS 'שם פרמטר 1' ----Choose your Client preffer specdes number
		,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(ps.SPEC2) AS 'פרמטר 2'
		,ps.SPECDES2 AS 'שם פרמטר 2' ----Choose your Client preffer specdes number
		,ps.SPEC3 AS 'פרמטר 3' ------ SIZE
		,ps.SPECDES3 AS 'שם פרמטר 3' ----Choose your Client preffer specdes number
		,ps.SPEC3 AS 'פרמטר 4'
		,ps.SPECDES3 AS 'שם פרמטר 4' ----Choose your Client preffer specdes number
		,ps.SPEC4 AS 'פרמטר 5'
		,ps.SPECDES4 AS 'שם פרמטר 5' ----Choose your Client preffer specdes number
		,null AS 'פרמטר 12'
	    ,ps.SPEC15 AS 'פרמטר 15'
		,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(SPECDES15) AS 'שם פרמטר 15' 
		,p.COST AS 'עלות'
		,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(ps.SPEC6) AS 'מותג'
		,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(ps.SPEC8) AS 'מגדר'
		,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(ps.SPEC2) AS 'צבע'
		,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(ps.SPEC11) AS 'עונה'
        ,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(ps.SPEC17) AS 'קולקציה'
		,system.dbo.tabula_hebconvert(ps.SPEC10) AS 'גזרה'
		,NULL AS 'InventoryItem' -- if the item has inventory in warhouses , from master food
		,null AS 'גיל מלאי'
		,null AS 'מיון מלאי'
		,null AS 'תאריך כניסה אחרון למלאי'
		,NULL AS 'סוג ייבוא' -- if coming from local or imported 
		,NULL AS 'יחידות מכירה' -- from UNIT Table 
		,NULL AS 'גודל'
		,NULL AS 'משקל'
		,null as 'מנוהל מלאי'
		
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime


from [desig].[dbo].PART p 
	left join [desig].[dbo].FAMILY f on p.FAMILY=f.FAMILY
	left join [desig].[dbo].FAMILYTYPES ft on f.FAMILYTYPE=ft.FAMILYTYPE
	left join [desig].[dbo].PARTSPEC ps on p.PART=ps.PART
	left join [desig].[dbo].PART p2 on p.MPART=p2.PART
	inner join (
	select
	pti.PART
	,max(convert(smalldatetime, (pt.CURDATE + pt.CURTIME + 46283040) / 1440.0)) as 'DateTime'
	from [desig].[dbo].POS_TRANSACTIONS pt
	left join [desig].[dbo].POS_TRANSACTITEMS pti on pti.TRANSACT=pt.TRANSACT
	where 1=1
	and (pt.CURDATE <> 51852960 and convert(smalldatetime, (pt.CURDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0) >= DATEADD(Year,-3,DATEADD(yy, DATEDIFF(yy, 0, GETDATE()), 0)))
	and pti.IPRICEADISCOUNTBVAT<>0
	group by pti.PART
	) pti on pti.PART=p.PART

	where 1=1

		,CAST('1' as varchar) + CAST(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, pti.POS_USERBSALE)) as varchar) AS 'AgentKey' -- the sales representor

		,CAST('1' as varchar) + CAST(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, pti.PART)) as varchar) AS 'ItemKey'



		,CAST('1' as varchar) + CAST(CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(VARCHAR, pt.BRANCH)) as varchar) AS 'BranchKey'
		,null as 'EmployeeKey'
		,pti.CLUB as 'חבר מועדון'

		--,(1 - (1 - ii.[T$PERCENT] / 100) * (1 - i.[T$PERCENT] / 100)) AS 'DiscountPercent' -- the DiscountPercent for the invoice and invoice line

		,ROUND((1-(1-(pti.T$PERCENT/100))*(1-(pti.GENDISCPERC/100)))*(pti.PRICE*(pti.QUANT/1000))/(1+(pti.VATPERCENT/100)),2) AS 'LineTotalDiscount' -- the discount from gross price to the net
		,ROUND((1-(1-(pti.T$PERCENT/100))*(1-(pti.GENDISCPERC/100)))*(pti.PRICE*(pti.QUANT/1000)),2) as 'LineTotalDiscountVAT'
		--,ROUND(ii.PRICE, 2) * ii.IEXCHANGE AS 'UnitGrossPrice'
		,ROUND(pti.PRICE/(1+(pti.VATPERCENT/100)),2) AS 'UnitNetPrice'
		,pti.PRICE as 'UnitPriceVAT'

		,(pti.QUANT/1000.0) AS 'Quantity'
		,null as 'factoryQuantity'
		,null AS 'LineTotalCost' 
		,(1-(pti.T$PERCENT/100))*(1-(pti.GENDISCPERC/100))*(pti.PRICE/(1+(pti.VATPERCENT/100))*(pti.QUANT/1000.0)) AS 'LineTotalNet'
		--ROUND((pti.IPRICEADISCOUNTBVAT*(pti.QUANT/1000)),2) AS 'LineTotalNet'

	    ,null AS 'LineTotalNet_USD'
		,ROUND((pti.IPRICEADISCOUNTBVAT*(pti.QUANT/1000.0)*(1+(pti.VATPERCENT/100))),2) AS 'LineTotalNetVAT'
		,null AS 'LineTotalNetVAT_USD'
		,CONVERT(INT, LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, (i.IVDATE + 46283040) / 1440.0), 112), 6)) AS YearMonth
		,null as 'סטטוס'
		,null  as 'ChargeFlag'  
		,null as 'סטטוס ליקוט כותרת'
	    ,null  as 'סטטוס ליקוט שורה'
		,null  as 'דגל סטורנו'
		
		,GETDATE() AS RowInsertDatetime

with CTE_LOADS as
(
SELECT
	   [CONSIGNEE] AS 'סוג מאחסן'
      ,[SKU] AS 'מספר פריט'
      ,[STATUS] AS 'סטטוס במלאי'
	  ,SUM([UNITS]) AS 'מלאי עדכני'

FROM [SCEXPERT].[dbo].[LOADS]

WHERE 1=1
and (STATUS = 'NANG' OR STATUS ='NAGO' OR STATUS ='AVAILABLE' OR STATUS ='BOOKED' OR STATUS ='ANGO')
and [CONSIGNEE] in ('10')
and [SKU] not like '8%'
group by [CONSIGNEE], [SKU], [STATUS]
)

select CTE_LOADS.*
	  ,sku.SKUSHORTDESC
	  ,sku.MANUFACTURERSKU
	  ,sku.BASEITEM
from CTE_LOADS left join SKU sku on CTE_LOADS.[מספר פריט] = sku.SKU

with CTE_LOADS as
(
SELECT
	   [CONSIGNEE] AS 'סוג מאחסן'
      ,[SKU] AS 'מספר פריט'
      ,[STATUS] AS 'סטטוס במלאי'
	  ,SUM([UNITS]) AS 'מלאי עדכני'

FROM [SCEXPERT].[dbo].[LOADS]

WHERE 1=1
and (STATUS = 'NANG' OR STATUS ='NAGO' OR STATUS ='AVAILABLE' OR STATUS ='BOOKED' OR STATUS ='ANGO')
and [CONSIGNEE] in ('10')
and [SKU] not like '8%'
group by [CONSIGNEE], [SKU], [STATUS]
)

select CTE_LOADS.*
	  ,sku.SKUSHORTDESC
	  ,sku.MANUFACTURERSKU
	  ,sku.BASEITEM
from CTE_LOADS left join SKU sku on CTE_LOADS.[מספר פריט] = sku.SKU

SELECT
	   DISTINCT([AUDITID])
      ,AU.[USERID] AS 'משתמש'
      ,AU.[ACTIVITYDATE] AS 'זמן הפעולה'
	  ,cast(AU.[ACTIVITYDATE] as date) AS 'Date'
      ,AU.[DOCUMENT] AS 'שם מסמך'
      ,AU.[DOCUMENTLINE] AS 'שורת מסמך'
      ,AU.[FROMLOAD] AS 'מטעינה'
      ,AU.[TOLOAD] AS 'לטעינה'
      ,AU.[FROMLOC] AS 'ממיקום'
      ,AU.[TOLOC] AS 'למיקום'
      ,AU.[FROMQTY] AS 'מכמות'
      ,AU.[TOCONTAINER] AS 'לקונטיינר'
	  ,VS.[SKU] AS 'מספר פריט'
	  ,VS.[SKUDESC] AS 'תאור פריט'
	  ,OL.ORDERID AS 'מספר הזמנה'
      ,AU.[TOQTY] AS 'לכמות'
	  ,VS.each_in_case -- CHECK IF NULL FOR 1 
	  ,ISNULL(VS.each_in_case,1.00)		AS 'גורם אירוז'
	  ,FLOOR(AU.TOQTY / ISNULL(VS.each_in_case,1.00) ) AS 'כמות ארגזים'
	  ,AU.TOQTY - (ISNULL(VS.each_in_case,1.00) * FLOOR(AU.TOQTY/ ISNULL(VS.each_in_case,1.00) )) AS 'כמות יחידות'

FROM [SCEXPERT].[dbo].[vsku] VS
LEFT JOIN [SCEXPERT].[dbo].[AUDIT] AU	ON VS.SKU = AU.SKU 
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[ORDERLOADS] OL			ON OL.PICKLIST = AU.DOCUMENT
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[SKUUOM] SKUU			ON SKUU.SKU = VS.SKU

WHERE AU.CONSIGNEE = 'JV'
AND AU.ACTIVITYTYPE = 'PICKLOAD'
